featured.text: They are located near Ecuador in the Pacific Ocean.
This group of islands off the coast of Ecuador has recently contracted Argentine Corporación America to manage the redevelopment of the airport on the island of Baltra.

definition.zh_def: 厄瓜多爾，位於南美洲的國家，以其多樣的生態系統和安第斯山脈而聞名。
definition.en_def: Ecuador, a country located in South America, known for its diverse ecosystems and the Andes mountains.
definition.example: Ecuador is famous for the Galápagos Islands and its rich biodiversity.
